## ActivityInstance.resumeBookmark property

Resume bookmark for suspended automated activities. During suspending of activity user can specify "ResumeBookmark" object. With its help script execution can be started in future from specific place, but not from the very beginning.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get resumeBookmark(): string | undefined;
```
